overview:
A 16 year veteran in the video games information space, Marci Yamaguchi Hughes serves as president of GamePro Media, publisher of GamePro Magazine and Gamepro.com. She is responsible for overseeing the overall stewardship of the GamePro brands and all aspects of the online and print businesses.

Prior to joining GamePro Media, Yamaguchi Hughes was senior vice president of sales and marketing for the game group at Ziff Davis Media, which included 1UP.com, FileFront.com, and EGM Magazine (Electronic Gaming Monthly). Yamaguchi Hughes played an integral role in the launch of 1UP.com in 2003. Under her leadership, she spearheaded the first-ever successful integration of print and online sales teams in the marketplace in 2005, leading to a 200 percent year-over-year growth in online revenue.

Yamaguchi Hughes began her career at Ziff Davis in 1989 at MacUser and PC Week. She currently serves on the Board of Governors of MI6, the Association of Electronic Interactive Marketers, and organizer of the MI6 conference. A California native, she resides in the Bay Area with her husband and 2 sons.
